instruction: Develop a song with a melancholic tone.
output:
Verse 1:
The lonely night brings a sorrowful heart
The silence is like a heavy dark sheet on me 
The heaviness of life surrounds me with no hope 
Chorus:
The world is an empty vessel I can hear my cries
The stars are no longer shining so I just close my eyes 
Verse 2:
The cold winds of life numb me to the core 
My forlorn heart cries for a love that it can't find 
All I wanna do is fly away into the sky
Chorus: 
The world is an empty vessel I can hear my cries
The stars are no longer shining so I just close my eyes 
Bridge:
And though I may be all alone 
My life still goes on without a home 
And I will search for a light one day 
To take away all this pain away 
Chorus: 
The world is an empty vessel I can hear my cries
The stars are no longer shining so I just close my eyes 
Outro:
The stars are no longer shining so I just close my eyes.
